The C++ class library: http://www.paintlib.de/paintlib/paintlib24.zip (about 1000 kb)

Download this file. In addition to it, download libpng, zlib, libtiff, libungif and libjpeg if you want png, tiff, gif and jpeg support. See the links page for locations of these libraries. (Unix users: use unzip -a or you'll get dos line endings, provoking all sorts of unintelligible error messages.)

paintX: http://www.paintlib.de/paintlib/paintx.zip (about 200 kb)

You can also download the suite of test images: http://www.paintlib.de/paintlib/testpic.zip (about 430 kb)

Older versions of paintlib are also still available, starting with version 2.0:

http://www.paintlib.de/paintlib/paintlib20.zip

http://www.paintlib.de/paintlib/paintlib21.zip

http://www.paintlib.de/paintlib/paintlib22.zip

http://www.paintlib.de/paintlib/paintlib23.zip

http://www.paintlib.de/paintlib/paintlib23a.zip

The latest development snapshot is available via anon cvs at http://sourceforge.net/projects/paintlib/
